title: AI-Driven Safe Navigation Tool
description: Develops an AI-based tool for real-time safe route navigation using big data and AI algorithms.

title: Develop a Real-Time Decision Support Tool for Urban Roadway Safety Improvements.
description: This study used three national databases [National Performance Management Research Data Set (NPMRDS), Travel Monitoring Analysis System (TMAS), and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)] to develop SPFs (both annual and short-duration) for urban roadways.

title: Vehicle Probe Data for Speed Limit Evaluation
description: Explores the use of vehicle probe data to determine speed limits.

title: Leveraging AI to Manage Freeway Congestion
description: Mitigates freeway congestion using AI to validate data sources and models.

title: Safety Enhancements at Railroad Crossings
description: Explores safety enhancements at short-storage-space railroad crossings.

title: Speed Crash Modification Factors
description: Develops speed crash modification factors for rural and urban roads.
